item.description:
Hi Packers,

Another week another win (even if it was a little too close for comfort towards the end) and we move on to Atlanta, thank you to all the group who came out and supported the green and gold yesterday, great crowd, the 2nd floor was packed and overflowed to the 1st. This weekâ€™s game is at 8pm on Saturday night, we will have the game on both floors but if you prefer the 2nd floor please get in early to get your seat. Each Saturday night we have a DJ that plays, this week he will play but only after the game and our kitchen will stay open through out the game so come hungry and thirsty. Hope you have a great week, go pack.

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay at Atlanta
